articles.description: Venkatesh Prasad recently said that a day hasn’t gone by since March 9, 1996, that someone hasn’t asked about Aamer Sohail’s dismissal in the 1996 World Cup quarter-final match.

articles.description: Wimbledon Championships made a magnanimous announcement. They have decided to distribute £10 million of prize money amongst the professionals.
articles.content: Amid the tour’s suspension, lowered-ranked tennis players are facing a tough time in supporting their livelihood as they are unable to earn their weekly prize money. However, the most prestigious Sla… [+2693 chars]

articles.title: Darren Sammy backs Lungi Ngidi after former South Africa players criticise pacer on ‘BLM’ stance - The Indian Express
articles.description: Ngidi's comments did not go down well with former South African cricketers Pat Symcox, Boeta Dippenaar and wicketkeeper Rudi Steyn, who slammed the 24-year-old for not speaking up against the attacks on white farmers in the country.
